name: MCH Ventures Inc.
description: Provider of a prenatal and postpartum care management platform designed to deliver personalized, ongoing education and live support to new families everywhere. The company's care management platform is a collaboration between maternity, infant care practitioners and large health systems to connect and integrate care across a highly fragmented maternal care system comprised of hospitals, insurers, health systems and private practices, enabling patients to reduce hospital re admissions and increases breastfeeding rates.
